title: Part (a)
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The drawing meets neither of the criteria below:
The drawing meets one of the criteria below:
The drawing meets both of the criteria below:

title: Part (b)
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions: The response does not show a dashed curve that starts and ends at the same points as the curve drawn for part (a) but has a shorter peak.
The response shows a dashed curve that starts and ends at the same points as the curve drawn for part (a) but has a shorter peak.

title: Part (c)
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response. To earn credit, the response must be consistent with the graph drawn in part (a).
descriptions: The response does not show a vertical line segment with its bottom end at the level of the product line and its top end at the level of the top of the peak for the uncatalyzed reaction drawn on the graph.
The response shows a vertical line segment with its bottom end at the level of the product line and its top end at the level of the top of the peak for the uncatalyzed reaction drawn on the graph.
